name: run
description: Builds the application and serves up the assets via a local web server, watching files for changes as you work.

flags.name: analyze
flags.description: Enable Webpack Bundle Analyzer. Typically paired with --env prod

flags.name: host
flags.description: Set host address of the dev server, the accessible URL

flags.name: port
flags.description: Set port number of the dev server

flags.name: open
flags.description: Open the default browser at the application location.
